channel.title: Timothy Eaton | Full-stack Developer
channel.description: Full-stack developer writing about code, design, typography, and miscellanious stories.

item.title: Lost in Translation: My German Language Misadventures
item.description: How I accidentally told my language teacher I was a pregnant helicopter, and other linguistic failures

item.title: The French Dentist Incident
item.description: A tale of miscommunication, mime, and dental hygiene in Paris

item.title: Adventures in Airport Security
item.description: That time I tried to explain why I had a rubber chicken in my carry-on

item.title: The High-Tech Toilet Incident
item.description: My first encounter with a Japanese smart toilet, and how I accidentally became a viral sensation

item.title: The Great Family Dinner Debacle
item.description: How I managed to offend three generations with one mistranslated compliment
